name: Lost Woods
description:
She ran away again.

Go find her.

---

Lost Woods is a glitchcore first person horror game. That's all I'd like to say about the actual content.

I started this in 2013 for 7DFPS, but other things got in the way, then I struggled with porting it from GM7 to GMStudio. It was almost finished when I stopped working on it though, but I finally got around to fixing it up in GMS.
